ygData.messageBody:
now i understand at level 16 or close to that wizards need to
>research to get new spells...

All four magic user clases get a research at lv. 16 but as i have seen in
shops you can buy many higher lv spels also there but a cost is realy high.
Researching you can create some better spels and also create old shop
selled ones but at lower price.

where do i get the tume from???

Your guils shop owner normaly have a tome for you.

what things are
>put in to mkae new spells??

when you find a components list you will have to go around a world
searching for components wich will be found randomly on inteligent or magic
monsters mainly.

if someone can help me thanks

I hope that this help until you get your hands on Everquest :)
